snippet: Operating income at Disney's parks division was up 18 percent over the same quarter a year ago, a positive sign for the broader economy and an indication of that sector's overall strength. The company's cable division also did well, but the film...
abstract: Operating income at Disney's parks division was up 18 percent over the same quarter a year ago, a positive sign for the broader economy and an indication of that sector's overall strength. The company's cable division also did well, but the film unit's performance was more mixed.

headline.main: Theme Park Income Spurs Profits at Disney
headline.print_headline: Disney Profit Lifted by ESPN and Parks
